description: Operators that are able to increase resistance

haruka: Nightingale but better, S3 is same but with vastly better skill cycles, 60% damage reduction
nightingale: Hands down the best resistance buff in the game, essentially removes the concept of arts damage

nasti: Kinda massive sanctuary for all ranged operators
nightingale: Hands down the best resistance buff in the game, removes the concept of arts damage

bassline: Kind of, with an arts shield

croissant: OK arts dodge buff, can share to close-by allies
